title.value: Ageism and Artificial Intelligence: Protocol for a Scoping Review
title.justification: The title is explicitly stated in the paper's citation information.
title.quote: Ageism and Artificial Intelligence: Protocol for a Scoping Review

extractions.description: This paper presents a protocol for a scoping review that aims to explore how age-related bias is encoded or amplified in AI systems and the corresponding legal and ethical implications.

type.justification: The paper outlines a protocol for a scoping review, which involves plan and framework discussion rather than empirical experimentation.
type.quote: Objective: This paper documents the search strategy and process for a scoping review exploring how age-related bias is encoded or amplified in AI systems as well as the corresponding legal and ethical implications.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on the ethical considerations of age-related biases in AI systems.
name.quote: Objective: This paper documents the search strategy and process for a scoping review exploring how age-related bias is encoded or amplified in AI systems as well as the corresponding legal and ethical implications.

name.justification: The paper is focused on identifying and understanding age-related bias in AI systems.
name.quote: Objective: This paper documents the search strategy and process for a scoping review exploring how age-related bias is encoded or amplified in AI systems.
